properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You alone Are my strength my shield To You alone may my spirit yield You alone are my heart's desire And I long to worship Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As the deer panteth for the water So my soul longeth after Thee You alone are my heart's desire And I long to worship Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You're my friend And You call me brother Even though You are a King I love You more than any other So much more than anything{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want You more than gold Or silver Only You can satisfy You alone are the real joy giver And the apple of my eye{/lang-eng}
